question:
Consider the following statements:
1. India’s onshore crude oil production is significantly more than offshore crude oil production
2. India’s offshore natural gas production is significantly more than onshore natural gas production
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: In 2010-11, India produced 37712 thousand tons of Crude Oil. The Onshore production was 16428 thousand tons and Offshore production was 21284 thousand tons. In 2010-11, India produced 52252 Million Cubic Meters of Natural Gas. The Onshore production was 8577 million cubic meter and Offshore production was 43645 million cubic meters.
